attributes.action: ensure that all MP's found to have abused the spirit of the expenses and second home allowance, be made to pay restitution back to the treasury for the same amount.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any profit made by MP's from second home sales, financed from the allowances scheme for refurbishment, and frivolous claims not necessary in the running of their position as an MP, to refurbish, improve or upgrade, including food, to such property, be subject to reclamation to the treasury. To be backdated 5 years.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
